subject: Contributor pitch: eToro copy trading — nearly 10 years of real-money results
body:
Hi Benzinga team,

I'm Tom from Social Trading Vlog. I've been using eToro's copy trading feature with real money since 2016 — nearly 10 years — documenting everything on YouTube (335 videos) and socialtradingvlog.com.

I'd like to contribute an article:

"eToro Copy Trading: A Nearly 10-Year Performance Review with Real Numbers"

This would include:

- My actual annualised returns over nearly a decade
- Breakdown of fees, spreads, and hidden costs
- How different market conditions (COVID crash, 2022 bear, 2024-25 bull) affected copy trading portfolios
- Honest pros and cons from someone who has no affiliation with eToro beyond being a user

My content stands out because it's based on documented, real experience — not affiliate-driven reviews or theory. I have nearly 10 years of video evidence to back everything up.

Interested? I can send a full draft or outline.

Best,
Tom
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
